1A IV(ආ) ෙකොටස - ශී ලංකා පජාතාන්තික සමාජවාදී ජනරජෙය් අති විෙශෂ ගැසට් පතය - 2018.01.11 
Pൺඋඍ  IV(B) -  GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIST REPUBLIC OF SRI LANKA – 11.01.2018 
LOCAL AUTHORITIES ELECTION ORDINANCE (CHAPTER 262) 
Division of Local Authority Areas into Polling Districts 
Notice under Section 12(1) 
 
The public is hereby notified that the Polling Districts of  Local Authority Areas of Colombo Administrative District 
mentioned in the Schedule hereto that were valid for Parliamentary Elections have amended for the purpose of Local 
Authority Elections as mentioned in the same.  
 W. M.C. K ඎආඎൽඎඇൾൾ Wංඃൾ඄ඎඋඎඉඉඎ, 
 Assistant Returning Officer of Colombo District, 
 For Returning Officer of Colombo District. 
Colombo (City) Elections Office. 
Colombo. 
LOCAL GOVERNMENT AUTHORITY ELECTORAL REGISTER - 2018 
 
Administrative District : 01 - Colombo 
Local Government Authority : Colombo Municipal Council 
 
 
 Ward Description 
      Number and Letter 
 
 Ward Number 01 - Sammanthranapura 
 1-A Sammanthanapura (First. Stage) (including A,C,E,P,I and K letters) and Sammanthanapura 
First. Stage  unauthorized houses T/1 to T/75). Sammanthranapura Grama Niladari Division 
belongs to  Colombo  Divisional Secretariat Division of the Colombo Municipal Council 
 
 
 1-B  Sammanthranapura First. Stage Houses including B,D,F,H,J,M, Letters and 
Sammanthranapura First. Stage Unauthorized houses T/76 to the End). Sammanthranapura 
Grama Niladari Division belongs to  Colombo Divisional Secretariat Division of the Colombo 
Municipal Council

අංක 2053/41 - 2018 ජනවාරි මස 11  වැනි බහස්පතින්දා - 2018.01.11 
 
No. 2053/41 –  THURSDAY, JANUARY 11,  2018

Division of Local Authority Areas into Polling Districts 
Notice under Section 12(1) 
 
THE public is hereby notified that the Polling Districts of  Local Authority Areas of Ga mpaha Administrative District 
mentioned in the Schedule hereto that were valid for Parlia mentary Elections have been amended for the purpose of   
Local Authority Elections as mentioned in the same.  
 
 
 T. A. C. N. T ඁൺඅൺඇ඀ൺආൺ, 
 Assistant Returning Officer  
 Kandy District, 
 For Returning Officer of Kandy District. 
 
Kandy Elections Office. 
District Secretariat 
Kandy  
 
  
District : 04 - Kandy 
Local Government Authority : Kandy Municipal Council

Division of Local Authority Areas into Polling Districts

599A 
Local Authorities Election Ordinance  (Chapter 262 ) 
 
Division of Local Authority Areas into Polling Districts  
 
Notice under Section 12 (1) 
 
 
The Public is hereby notified that the Polling Districts of Local Authority Areas of Batticaloa Admi nistrative District 
mentioned in the Schedule hereto that were valid for Parliamentary Elections have been amended for t he purpose of  
Local Authority Elections as mentioned in the same.  
 
  R. SASEELAN, 
 Assistant Returning Officer, 
 Batticaloa District for Returning Officer of  
 Batticaloa District.

Batticaloa. 
Local Authority Electoral Register - 2018 
 
Schedule 
Administrative District  : 15 Batticaloa 
Local Authority : Batticaloa Municipal Council 
 
 Polling District Description 
 No. and Letter 
   Ward Number - 01 Amirthakali    
 1 - A School Road, Kathirkamar Road, Bar Road (Part), New Boundary Road (Part) of the 
Amirthakali Grama Niladhari Division No. 173, in the Manmunai North Divisional 
Secretariat Division belonging to Batticaloa Municipal Council.

IV (ආ) ෙකʣටස - ɼ ලංකා ȝජාතාǦƵක සමාජවාǏ ජනරජෙɏ අƯɪෙශෂ ගැසŸ පƴය - 2018.01.11

 No.  and Letter 
   Ward No. 01– Ganthalawa

Kanthale Divisional Secretariat, consisting Ganthalawa Unit 11 and The area belongs to 
No. 227 S Ganthalawa Unit 12 Grama Niladari Division, Consisting Ganthalawa Unit 12.

Kanthale Divisional Secretariat, consisting Wendrasanpura Colony Unit 16 (Part), 
Wendrasanpura Colony Unit 16 -Trincomalee Road (Part), Railway road.

Kanthale Divisional Secretariat, consisting Wendrasanpura Colony Unit 16 (Part).  
  
   Ward No. 02– Wanela

Divisional Secretariat, consisting Tank Lower Road, Pilleyar Junction road, Temple Front

Divisional Secretariat, consisting Kooniththeevu main road, Kooniththeevu 1st cross 
street, Kooniththeevu 2nd cross street, Kooniththeevu 3rd cross street, Kooniththeevu 4th 
cross street, Kooniththeevu 5th cross street, Kooniththeevu 6th cross street, Soodaikkuda 
1st cross street, Soodaikkuda 2nd cross street, Soodaikkuda 3rd cross street, Soodaikkuda 
4th cross street, Soodaikkuda 5th cross street, Soodaikkuda 6th cross street, Soodaikkuda

900A IV(ආ) ෙකොටස - ශී ලංකා පජාතාන්තික සමාජවාදී ජනරජෙය් අතිවිෙශෂ ගැසට් පතය - 2018.01.11 
Pൺඋඍ  IV(B) -  GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIST REPUBLIC OF SRI LANKA – 11.01.2018 
Local Authorities Elections Ordinance (Chapter 262) 
Division of Local Authority Areas into Polling Districts 
Notice under Section 12(1) 
 
 
 
The public is hereby notified that the Polling Districts of Loc al Authority Areas of Ratnapur a Administrative District 
mentioned in the Schedule hereto that were valid for Parliament ary Elections have amended for the purpose of Local 
Authority Elections as mentioned in the same.

  Ward Number 01 - Hinguraara

960A                IV(ආ) ෙකොටස - ශී ලංකා පජාතාන්තික සමාජවාදී ජනරජෙය් අති විෙශෂ ගැසට් පතය - 2018.01.11
